data.client_settings: Canary, Build Number: 29791 - ptb, Build Number: 29783 - stable, Build Number: 29783
data.actual_result: The Microphone Quality is supposed to drop and sound terrible compared to how it would sound like in other Applications.
data.expected_result: The Microphone Quality is supposed to be normal and sound about the same as it would sound in any other application.
data.short_description: Mic Issues with Discord that causes mic quality to drop drastically.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to settings, Voice & Video and make sure your Microphone that you have connected is selected - Click on the Let's Check Button and listen to the Microphone Quality drop to terrible levels.
